entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing space character in auto completed new statement for a C# array #66027
  • Suppress Warning CS6800 when the System Type.GetType(..) method's parameter throwOnError (bool) contains a true value #66025

Closed

  • Integration tests fail with "VSIX installer failed...Unable to find the specified file." #65824
  • Completion list is missing members when typing generic delegate parameter containing IEnumerable<T> #43847
    Backlog
  • Source generators in multi-targeted project being loaded twice #65996
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33215.136 #66029
  • Disabling Quick Info integration tests due to CI flakeyness. #62280

PullRequests

Created

  • Correctly parse local function with several async modifiers #66030
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support Go To Definition in Object Browser for metadata references #66026
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Report error implementing interface with `[UnscopedRef]` member #66024
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Improve performance of Document-Highlight-Refs #66023
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Update PublicAPI.Shipped for 17.4 #65956
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Needs API Review
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66022
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65972
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge features/SharedSyntaxTrees into dev17.6 #66003
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.6 into features/SharedSyntaxTrees #66028
    Area-IDE
  • Consolidate IsExternalInit definitions #66020
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Breaking change: Disallow raw-string-literal interpolations at start of line when indentation-whitespace is present. #65973
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66032
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66031
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Update analyzers package version #65997
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • inheritdoc order fixes #54494 #54618
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Emit and report missing `Decimal-` and `DateTimeConstantAttribute` #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • OptionKey clean-up and integration tests #66016
    Area-IDE
  • Delete Compilers.sln and keep only Compilers.slnf #65802
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Support MemberNotNull on required members in nullable analysis #65987
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Produce error when static local function captures a local with extension method method group conversion #65965
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update code style + dotnet-format #66021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers
